name: Spaghetti Marinara
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions. Warm marinara sauce in a pan. Combine pasta with sauce, then season with salt and pepper.

name: Chicken Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat oil in a wok or pan. Stir-fry chicken pieces until cooked. Add vegetables, soy sauce, and spices. Serve with rice.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter two slices of bread. Place cheese slices between them. Grill in a pan until golden brown on both sides.

name: Garden Salad
instructions: Chop lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and onions. Toss in a bowl with dressing. Top with croutons or cheese if desired.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, milk, and eggs into a batter. Cook on a greased griddle until golden on both sides.
